quote: Walter Jr., you're my big man. There are going to be some things that you'll come to learn about me in the next few days. But just know that no matter how it may look, I only had you in my heart. Goodbye!
author: Walter White

quote: Do what you're gonna do.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: I want my kids back. I want my life back. Please tell me – How much is enough? How big does this pile have to be?
author: Skyler White

quote: It can be done exactly how I want it. The only question is: Are you the man to do it? Figure it out. That's what I'm paying you for.
author: Walter White

quote: I am the man that I am son, and there's plenty that I would change about that but, here we are and this is just what it is.
author: Walter White

quote: Never say never
author: Saul Goodman

quote: Moral of the story is: I chose a half measure when I should have gone all the way. I'll never make that mistake again. No more half measures, Walter.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: Send him to Belize? I'll send YOU to Belize.
author: Walter White

quote: I'm sorry, what were you asking me? Oh, yes, that stupid plastic container I asked you to buy. You see, hydrofluoric acid won't eat through plastic; it will however dissolve metal, rock, glass, ceramic. So there's that.
author: Walter White

quote: Right now, what I need, is for you to climb down out of my ass. Can you do that? Will you do that for me honey? Will you please, just once, get off my ass? You know? I'd appreciate it. I really would.
author: Walter White

quote: Being the best at something is a very rare thing. You don't just toss something like that away. And what, you wanna squander that potential?
author: Walter White

quote: Cooking is art. And the shit I cook is the bomb.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I do not believe fear to be an effective motivator. I want investment. For now, I'm simply interested in time frame.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: You need to stop focusing on the darkness behind you. The past is the past. Nothing can change what we’ve done.
author: Walter White

quote: Ignorance of the law doesn't equate to criminality. It equates to ignorance.
author: Skyler White

quote: Did you just bring a bomb into a hospital?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: You're never too old for balloons.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And I was really... I was alive.
author: Walter White

quote: I am not in danger, Skyler. I AM the danger!
author: Walter White

quote: Don't drink and drive but if you do, call me.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: Say my name.
author: Walter White

quote: Yeah, science!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: You know, you all know exactly who I am. Say my name.
author: Walter White

quote: You either run from things, or you face them, Mr. White.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I'm in the empire business.
author: Walter White

quote: No matter what happens, no more bloodshed.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: I’ve still got things left to do.
author: Walter White

quote: I will kill your wife, I will kill your son, I will kill your infant daughter.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: Yeah Mr. White! Yeah, science!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: You clearly don’t know who you’re talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger.
author: Walter White

quote: You are a time bomb, tick-tick-ticking. And I have no intention of being around for the boom.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: I’m not in the meth business. I’m in the empire business.
author: Walter White

quote: Shut up! Shut up! Shut up!
author: Skyler White

quote: I watched Jane die.
author: Walter White

quote: If you believe that there’s a hell, I don’t know if you’re into that. But we’re already pretty much going there, right?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I did it for me. I liked it.
author: Walter White

quote: We’re done when I say we’re done.
author: Walter White

quote: It’s over when I say it’s over.
author: Walter White

quote: Run.
author: Walter White

quote: You can’t sell millions of dollars of meth without breaking a few eggs.
author: Walter White

quote: I am the one who knocks!
author: Walter White

quote: You know, I'm not really a 'work for free' kind of guy.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: What’s the point of being an outlaw when you got responsibilities?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: We’re done when I say we’re done.
author: Walter White

quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And I was really... I was alive.
author: Walter White

quote: You’re the smartest guy I ever met. And you’re too stupid to see he made up his mind ten minutes ago.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: I don’t know what’s wrong with me, Mr. White. I’m just so... I’m so sorry.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: The moral of the story is I chose a half measure, when I should have gone all the way.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: You all know exactly who I am. Say my name.
author: Walter White

quote: You can’t keep getting away with this!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: No more half-measures.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: You know, you all know exactly who I am. Say my name.
author: Walter White

quote: I have nothing left to lose.
author: Walter White

quote: Do you know how much I make a year?
author: Walter White

quote: If you don’t know who I am, then maybe your best course would be to tread lightly.
author: Walter White

quote: All I can do is wait for the cancer to come back.
author: Walter White

quote: We’re done when I say we’re done.
author: Walter White

quote: The moral of the story is I chose a half measure, when I should have gone all the way.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: Say my name.
author: Walter White

quote: You clearly don’t know who you’re talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger.
author: Walter White

quote: I chose a half measure when I should have gone all the way.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: It’s over when I say it’s over.
author: Walter White

quote: You’re trouble. I’m trouble.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: This is my own private domicile, and I will not be harassed…b****!
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it.
author: Walter White

quote: All the lies, I can't even keep them straight anymore.
author: Skyler White

quote: Some people are immune to good advice.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: I know what happens if I don’t.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: You got me. I’m in the empire business.
author: Walter White

quote: The moral of the story is I chose a half measure, when I should have gone all the way.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger.
author: Walter White

quote: I trust the hole in the desert I’d leave you in.
author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quote: You’re my free pass.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I didn’t marry a criminal lawyer. I married a lawyer who’s a criminal.
author: Skyler White

quote: I’m not a hero. I’m a coward.
author: Walter White

quote: You don’t need a criminal lawyer. You need a criminal lawyer.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: When the going gets tough, you don’t want a criminal lawyer. You want a criminal lawyer.
author: Saul Goodman

quote: You think I came all this way just to let something as trivial as the truth get in the way?
author: Saul Goodman

quote: I was alive.
author: Walter White

quote: You got me. I’m in the empire business now.
author: Walter White

quote: You either run from things, or you face them.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: I’m not in this for money. I’m in this for me.
author: Walter White

quote: Family is everything.
author: Walter White

quote: It’s not about money, it’s about power.
author: Walter White

quote: I’m not a monster. I’m just ahead of the curve.
author: Walter White

quote: I just wanted to say that you’re a time bomb, tick-tick-ticking, and I have no intention of being around for the boom.
author: Skyler White

quote: I did it for my family.
author: Walter White

quote: I watched Jane die.
author: Walter White

quote: My name is ASAC Schrader, and you can go f*** yourself.
author: Hank Schrader

quote: What the hell is wrong with you? We’re a family!
author: Skyler White

quote: Jesse, you asked me if I was in the meth business or the money business. Neither. I’m in the empire business.
author: Walter White

quote: I have nothing to lose anymore.
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: Look at me! I’m the one who knocks!
author: Walter White

quote: I am the one who knocks.
author: Walter White

quote: To hell with your cancer. I’ve been living with cancer for twenty years.
author: Marie Schrader

quote: I’d rather not live in a world without Coca-Cola.
author: Gustavo Fring

quote: I’m not in danger, I am the danger.
author: Walter White

quote: What good is being an outlaw when you have responsibilities?
author: Jesse Pinkman

quote: You know why I do this. I do this for my family.
